title: KD Goes Off and Tom Brady is Back!
description:
Kevin Durant dropped 53 on the Knicks, and Jalen & Jacoby are here to tell you why it was magnificent, and what makes it important. It wasn't just what was happening on the court, Kyrie was sitting on the sideline, highlighting the absurdity of the issues this Nets team is currently facing. But whose fault is it, really? Jalen has an answer. Plus! I don't know if you heard, but a famous tosser of footballs has decided to un-retire! ESPN's Senior Daddying correspondent David Jacoby has the inside dope on what drove Tom Brady back to football. Plus much much more. Tap in! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
